Name of Skill

User Interface Design


Classification of Skill

Software Design Process


Prerequisites for Skill

To be a good User Interface Designer , a person should have :

  1. Understand user requirements and identify target users.
  2. Knowledge of prototyping tools, HTML, CSS
  3. Working knowledge about UI design and Usuability Principals
  4. A detail oriented aesthetic sense and creative thinking, with the proper choice of color, typeset and composition.

Related Software Engineering Area(s)

  • Software Testing - Usability Tasting
  • User Experience Design (User Interface design is part of it)
